mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user_character_map ( user_id, character_id, regist_ymdt, modify_ymdt ) SELECT u.user_id, c.character_id, NOW(), NOW() FROM tb_user u, tb_character c WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND c.character_id = #{characterId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.user_id AS userId, c.character_id AS characterId, c.character_name AS characterName, c.story AS story, c.image_url AS imageUrl, c.tier AS tier FROM tb_user_character_map m, tb_character c WHERE m.user_id = #{userId} AND c.character_id = m.character_id

SELECT s.skill_id AS skillId, s.skill_name AS skillName, s.jump AS jump, s.coin_pickup AS coinPickUp, s.bomb_shield AS bombShield FROM tb_user_character_skill_map m, tb_skill s WHERE m.user_id = #{userId} AND m.character_id = #{characterId} AND s.skill_id = m.skill_id
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_character_skill_map ( character_id, skill_id, modify_ymdt ) VALUES ( #{characterId}, #{skillId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT skill_id AS skillId, skill_name AS skillName FROM tb_user_character_skill_map m, tb_skill s WHERE m.user_id = #{userId} AND m.character_id = #{chracterId} AND s.skill_id = m.skill_id
